name: 10s Zombies
description:
You are a zombie. You need to get to the huge brain. You need to eat every 10 seconds. Stay away from the guards. If you die you can continue as one of the remaining zombies.

This is my improved post compo Ludum Dare 27 game. You can find the original entry here. The changes:

  • Downloadable offline version (with fullscreen support)
  • 10 new levels (20 total now)
  • Faster gameplay!
  • Killed humans become zombies
  • Improved visibility
  • New graphics
  • Simple score system: Eat humans, not your friends!
  • Small bugfixes (game pause, level replay, level changes…)

Play 10s Zombies in your browser

... or download the offline version here.
